briefTitle: Support and Rehabilitation Protocol for Non Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients in Complete Remission After Chemotherapy
officialTitle: Post Therapeutic Support and Rehabilitation Protocol in Hydrothermal Centers for Breast Cancer Patients in Complete Remission: a Multicenter Prospective Randomized Trial Testing the Intervention Versus Best Supportive Care
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* breast cancer
* treatment including a chemotherapy
* in complete remission
* last treatment in the last 9 months before inclusion
* signed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* metastatic disease
* relapse
* women enable to have physical activity
* heart disease or any pathology preventing physical activity
